House Bill/Resolution NO. PS00022
FULL TITLE : SUPPORT TO AMENDING THE CONSTITUTION THROUGH CONSTITUENT ASSEMBLY
SHORT TITLE : Constitutional Amendment
ABSTRACT : On motion of Rep. Bondoc, the Chair recognized Rep. Edgar Mary S. Sarmiento from the First District of Samar who defended the Members of the 17th Congress from their alleged incompetence to amend the Constitution. Speaking in Filipino, he said that they participated in the House-conducted executive course on legislation, were knowledgeable about the shortcomings of government, were exposed to the problems and concerns of their constituencies, and possessed integrity and heart and had the best interest of the people in mind. He explained that a new Constitution was necessary in view of the changing socioeconomic indicators and that the same would still be subject to a plebiscite. (SOURCE: House Journal No.6,pp.25-26)
